body:
As reported by @alalazo in https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/24445#pullrequestreview-693701411
MFEM 4.2 does not compile with recent Hypre releases 2.21 or 2.22.
But MFEM git master is OK with these two Hypre releases, introducing a proper hypre test around the 'hypre_ParcsrAdd' call.
title: MFEM 4.2 compiles with Hypre up to 2.20, develop is OK.
